mapper.select: /* 관리자 - 전체 가입 회원 조회 */ SELECT member_id AS memberId, member_password AS memberPw, search_member_password_answer AS memberPwAnswer, member_level_code AS memberLevel, member_name AS memberName, member_phone_number AS memberTelNo, member_email AS memberEmail, member_join_YMD AS memberJoinYMD, member_withdrawal_YN AS memberWithdrawalYN FROM member WHERE member_withdrawal_YN = 'N';
